verses.verse: Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%>, and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>, and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8104><s%>, You have kept all that Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H8085><s%>, and have obeyed my voice <S%H6963><s%> in all that I commanded you <S%H6680><s%>:

You have not left <S%H5800><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> these many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, but have kept <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the commandment <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

And now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given rest <S%H5117><s%> unto your brothers <S%H251><s%>, as he promised <S%H1696><s%> them <S%H6437><s%>: therefore now return you <S%H3212><s%>, and get you unto your tents <S%H168><s%>, and unto the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession <S%H272><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> you on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

But take diligent <S%H3966><s%> care <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> and the law <S%H8451><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H157><s%>, to love the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and to walk <S%H3212><s%> in all his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and to cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto him <S%H5647><s%>, and to serve him with all your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul <S%H5315><s%>.
So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them <S%H7971><s%>, and sent them away: and they went <S%H3212><s%> unto their tents <S%H168><s%>.

Now to the one half <S%H2677><s%> of the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> possession in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>: but unto the other half <S%H2677><s%> there gave <S%H5414><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> among <S%H5973><s%> their brothers <S%H251><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>. And when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> sent them away <S%H7971><s%> also unto their tents <S%H168><s%>, then he blessed them <S%H1288><s%>,

And he spoke <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, saying, Return <S%H7725><s%> with much <S%H7227><s%> riches <S%H5233><s%> unto your tents <S%H168><s%>, and with very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%>, with silver <S%H3701><s%>, and with gold <S%H2091><s%>, and with brass <S%H5178><s%>, and with iron <S%H1270><s%>, and with very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> clothes <S%H8008><s%>: divide <S%H2505><s%> the plunder <S%H7998><s%> of your enemies <S%H341><s%> with your brothers <S%H251><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%>, and departed <S%H3212><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>, which is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> unto the country <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, to the land <S%H776><s%> of their possession <S%H272><s%>, whereof they were possessed <S%H270><s%>, according to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And when they came <S%H935><s%> unto the borders <S%H1552><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, that are in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> there an altar <S%H4196><s%> by Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, a great <S%H1419><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> to see to <S%H4758><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H1121><s%>, the sons of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> have built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, in the borders <S%H1552><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, at the passage <S%H5676><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And when the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it <S%H5712><s%>, the whole congregation of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H6950><s%> at Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>, to go up <S%H5927><s%> to war against them <S%H6635><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and to the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, into the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>,

And with him ten <S%H6235><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%>, of each <S%H259><s%> chief <S%H5387><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> a prince <S%H1><s%> throughout all the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and each one <S%H376><s%> was an head <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> among the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And they came <S%H935><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and to the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, unto the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and they spoke <S%H1696><s%> with them <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, What trespass <S%H4604><s%> is this that you have committed <S%H4603><s%> against the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to turn away <S%H7725><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, in that you have built <S%H1129><s%> you an altar <S%H4196><s%>, that you might rebel <S%H4775><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>?

Is the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of Peor <S%H6465><s%> too little <S%H4592><s%> for us <S%H2891><s%>, from which we are not cleansed until this day <S%H3117><s%>, although there was a plague <S%H5063><s%> in the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>,

But that you must turn away <S%H7725><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>? and it will be <S%H4775><s%>, seeing you rebel to day <S%H3117><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, that to morrow <S%H4279><s%> he will be angry <S%H7107><s%> with the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%>, if the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession <S%H272><s%> be unclean <S%H2931><s%>, then pass you over <S%H5674><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, where the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> dwells <S%H7931><s%>, and take possession <S%H270><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> us <S%H4775><s%>: but rebel not against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, nor <S%H408><s%> rebel <S%H4775><s%> against us <S%H1129><s%>, in building you an altar <S%H4196><s%> beside <S%H1107><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>.

Did not Achan <S%H5912><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%> commit <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> in the accursed thing <S%H2764><s%>, and wrath <S%H7110><s%> fell <S%H1961><s%> on all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>? and that man <S%H376><s%> perished <S%H1478><s%> not alone <S%H259><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%>, and said <S%H1696><s%> unto the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>,

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H410><s%> of gods <S%H430><s%>, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H410><s%> of gods <S%H430><s%>, he knows <S%H3045><s%>, and Israel <S%H3478><s%> he shall know <S%H3045><s%>; if it be in rebellion <S%H4777><s%>, or if in transgression <S%H4604><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, (save <S%H3467><s%> us not this day <S%H3117><s%>,)

That we have built <S%H1129><s%> us an altar <S%H4196><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, or if to offer <S%H5927><s%> on it burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> or food offering <S%H4503><s%>, or if to offer <S%H6213><s%> peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings <S%H2077><s%> on it <S%H3068><s%>, let the Lord himself require it <S%H1245><s%>;

And if we have not rather done <S%H6213><s%> it for fear <S%H1674><s%> of this thing <S%H1697><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, In time to come <S%H4279><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> might speak <S%H559><s%> unto our sons <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What have you to do with the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>?

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has made <S%H5414><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> a border <S%H1366><s%> between us and you <S%H1121><s%>, you sons of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>; you have no part <S%H2506><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: so shall your sons <S%H1121><s%> make <S%H7673><s%> our sons <S%H1121><s%> cease <S%H7673><s%> from <S%H1115><s%> fearing <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
Therefore we said <S%H559><s%>, Let us now prepare <S%H6213><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> us an altar <S%H4196><s%>, not for burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, nor for sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>:

But that it may be a witness <S%H5707><s%> between us <S%H1755><s%>, and you, and our generations after <S%H310><s%> us <S%H5647><s%>, that we might do the service <S%H5656><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him with our burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and with our sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, and with our peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>; that your sons <S%H1121><s%> may not say <S%H559><s%> to our sons <S%H1121><s%> in time to come <S%H4279><s%>, You have no part <S%H2506><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Therefore said <S%H559><s%> we <S%H559><s%>, that it shall be, when they should so say to us or to our generations <S%H1755><s%> in time to come <S%H4279><s%>, that we may say <S%H559><s%> again <S%H7200><s%>, Behold the pattern <S%H8403><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, which our fathers <S%H1><s%> made <S%H6213><s%>, not for burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, nor for sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>; but it is a witness between us and you <S%H5707><s%>.

God forbid <S%H2486><s%> that we should rebel <S%H4775><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and turn <S%H7725><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to build <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> for burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, for food offerings <S%H4503><s%>, or for sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, beside the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> his tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And when Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> and heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> which were with him <S%H8085><s%>, heard the words <S%H1697><s%> that the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%>, it pleased them <S%H3190><s%>.

And Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, This day <S%H3117><s%> we perceive <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is among <S%H8432><s%> us <S%H4603><s%>, because you have not committed this trespass <S%H4604><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: now <S%H227><s%> you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and the princes <S%H5387><s%>, returned <S%H7725><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, unto the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and brought <S%H7725><s%> them word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>.

And the thing <S%H1697><s%> pleased <S%H3190><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, and did not intend <S%H559><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> against them in battle <S%H6635><s%>, to destroy <S%H7843><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> where the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and Gad <S%H1410><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> Ed <S%H5707><s%>: for it shall be a witness between us that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is God <S%H430><s%>.
